channel.title: Quest Tab Help
channel.description:
Well, this is the only moparscape link I can find to reference to :
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,453588.0.html
and vains is gone for some reason...
I used to use Vains before it disappeared as a reference, so now I am totally lost?
I won't ask for you guys to spoon feed me a code, cause I actually understand [b]how[/b] to do the code. I just don't have a good reference tut now... anybody got a link?
(and if I can't post this just say so I will remove no need for flames about that )

item.title: Quest Tab Help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Alright thanks Vain got #1 working, will have to see what can be done later about #2 as i fail client sided lol

item.title: Quest Tab Help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Oh…hmm -/

Okay I got most of the tab done by converting other pi’s lol…

two questions left though and one I know partially.

  1. How do I make a teleport in the tab? ( in clickingbuttons I add it I think? the stuff to make it tele and stuff)

  2. How do I close the whole quest tab so it doesn’t show the scrollbar?

Read full topic
